Synthetic Industries is offering 110 mln dlrs of senior subordinated debentures due 1999 yielding 11-5/8 pct, said sole manager Merrill Lynch Capital Markets. The debentures have an 11-1/2 pct coupon and were priced at 99. Non-callable for five years, the issue is rated B-3 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and B-minus by Standard and Poor's Corp. The issue was increased from an initial offering of 100 mln dlrs. Reuter
